content.text: Match ends, Everton 1, Chelsea 1.
Second Half ends, Everton 1, Chelsea 1.
Attempt missed. Louis Saha (Everton) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Phil Neville.
Attempt missed. Michael Essien (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Didier Drogba with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Mikel Arteta.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Petr Cech.
Attempt saved. Jermaine Beckford (Everton) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top left corner.
Foul by Phil Neville (Everton).
Nicolas Anelka (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Everton. Phil Neville tries a through ball, but Jermaine Beckford is caught offside.
Substitution, Everton. Jermaine Beckford replaces Jack Rodwell.
Ramires (Chelsea) hits the right post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Branislav Ivanovic.
Substitution, Chelsea. John Obi Mikel replaces Frank Lampard.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Didier Drogba.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Branislav Ivanovic.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Branislav Ivanovic.
Attempt saved. Nicolas Anelka (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Salomon Kalou.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by José Bosingwa.
Goal!  Everton 1, Chelsea 1. Salomon Kalou (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Nicolas Anelka following a fast break.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Michael Essien.
Attempt blocked. Seamus Coleman (Everton) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Seamus Coleman (Everton) header from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Leighton Baines with a cross.
Substitution, Chelsea. Salomon Kalou replaces Florent Malouda.
Offside, Everton. Diniyar Bilyaletdinov tries a through ball, but Leighton Baines is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Mikel Arteta (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Ramires (Chelsea).

Seamus Coleman (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Diniyar Bilyaletdinov (Everton) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Phil Neville with a cross.
Goal!  Everton 1, Chelsea 0. Louis Saha (Everton) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Leighton Baines with a cross following a corner.

Foul by Ramires (Chelsea).

Attempt missed. Jack Rodwell (Everton) header from the left side of the six yard box misses to the right. Assisted by Leighton Baines with a cross following a corner.
